Package game

Class Character

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameObject
      • game.CameraObservedObject
        • game.Entity
          • game.Character
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player
    public abstract class Character
extends Entity
    This class represents all characters in the game which fight.

      Character​(java.awt.Point cameraLocation, double x, double y, double width, double height, boolean gravitational)
      This constructor is the same as Entity(Point, double, double, double, double, boolean), but will eventually initialize fighting related variables.

      • exclusionPrinciple

        public boolean exclusionPrinciple​(Terrain trr)
        Description copied from class: Entity
        Moves this entity to not collide with trr
        Overrides:
        exclusionPrinciple in class Entity
        Parameters:
        trr - The Terrain object that this Entity collides with.
        Returns:
        True if this entity is on top of the terrain and is therefore now grounded.
